name: Joseph Reinhardt
description: '''Joseph "Nin-Nin" Reinhardt''' (1912â€“1982) was the younger brother of guitarist [[Django Reinhardt]] and played rhythm guitar on most of Django's pre-war recordings, especially those with the [[Quintette du Hot Club de France]] between 1934 and 1939. He was a pioneer of the amplified jazz guitar in France and performed for years on a home-made instrument of his own design.
